title: Vertx SQL template mappers are not generated
body:
### Describe the bug

Row and parameter mappers are not generated for the Vertx `@DataObject`. I'm trying to use Vertx sql template in my Quarkus project like it is described [here](https://vertx.io/docs/vertx-sql-client-templates/java/#_mapping_with_vert_x_data_objects), but required mappers are not generated, meanwhile the json converter is successfully generated.

### Expected behavior

PersonRowMapper and PersonParamMapper are successfully generated

### Actual behavior

PersonRowMapper and PersonParamMapper are not generated

### How to Reproduce?

1. extract code from the archive
2. go to the project root directory
3. execute `./gradlew clean build`
4. check the generated classes
[quarkus-sql-template.zip](https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/files/14817265/quarkus-sql-template.zip)


### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

_No response_

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
